Unlimited Credits for all games, $8 for a wrist band.

#tribe-events-content

#tribe-events-pg-template

Open since early 2016, Lowry Parcade is Tampa’s first arcade and craft beer bar dedicated to providing the best in classic arcades, craft beer, and awesome events.
Amazing beer selection (and wine, too!)
Our passion for quality craft beer is matched with our love of old school games. Florida has an amazing range of breweries that we love to feature, so our beer menu focuses first on local breweries with their vast mix of styles.
Beyond Florida, we constantly rotate our other draft lines with selections from all over the nation and beyond. We also have tons of bottles and cans always on-hand, and a variety of wine styles if you prefer something from the vine.
Classic Arcade, Pinball, and More!
Our arcade is full of old school, nostalgic games such as Galaga, Ms. Pac-Man, Donkey Kong, X-Men, and many others
(
see the full list here!
)
. Games are 1-4 tokens per play.
We sell Tokens here, and the more you spend on Tokens, the more free ones you’ll get!
We continually rotate our Pinball Machines
(
full list here!
)
. We also have Skee-Ball, Air Hockey, Bubble Hockey, and more uncommon games.
If you have an arcade or pinball machine for sale, or if you’d like to request a machine, please contact us!
We’re friendly to all members of the family!
Until 9 PM, we welcome gamers of all ages! Kids are cool, but they have to stay with parents at all times. Please ensure that they respect the machines
(most are 20-30 years old)
, so encourage hugs instead of kicks.
We are 21+ after 9 PM, so adult swim rules apply: No kids after that point
We’re also dog friendly!
We love puppers! (Please keep them on a leash and close to you though, or we may keep them.)
We have events every week!
Daily Events and Specials
Unlimited Credits Mondays
– $8 for a wrist band, all machines on Free Play
Tacos & Trivia Tuesdays
– Every Tuesday at 7:30 PM
Token Thursdays
– Free tokens with every drink purchase
High Score Challenge
– Beat one of our high scores, win a prize
Token Beers –
Get free tokens when ordering select drinks
Monthly Happenings
Specialty beer tappings
and events such as “
Battle The Brewery
” happen
once a month
. Beat the brewery reps to win swag and free beer! Good times.
Local bands and DJs
come to perform regularly!
Art shows
Nerdy Burlesque
(that we creatively call … “Nerdlesque”) hits the stage on select nights!
And there are many, many more shows and things to do!
Check our
calendar
and
Facebook page
for upcoming events.
If you haven’t been by yet, we hope you decide to check us out soon! We work hard to have a friendly and comfortable environment for all to enjoy. For our visitors, both newbie and regular alike, THANK YOU SO MUCH for your support and love.
Cheers,
Your Friendly Neighborhood Parcade
/leaf_row
